description:
Elizabeth vanishes, leaving behind a sign that says "Don`t look."  Katsura asks Odd Jobs to help look for him, but then he remembers that it`s been a year since he last saw Elizabeth.  He never even realized that Elizabeth had left home!  They decide to go to Katsura`s home to search for clues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The People You Tend to Forget Tend to Show Up After You Forget Them
Wasureppoi Yatsu wa Wasureta Koro ni Yattekuru
忘れっぽい奴は忘れた頃にやってくる
